page.title: 05The Cairn
page.content: The Cairn can be found on a grassy patch on Cairnlee Avenue East.It is about 4000 years and was built by prehistoric hunters and farmers.It is protected under the ancient monuments act and it is an offence to remove stones or otherwise damage it. The Cairn is one of the oldest parts of Cults.It was originally one of three Cairns but unfortunately in December 1829 the other two Cairns were demolished to help repair flood damaged banks on the River Dee. There are four places on the Cairn where there are hollows.We think that the people who demolished the other two Cairns might have needed more stones so they took some from this Cairn. We think that the Cairn is still in good condition even after 4000 years.
